{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3522991,"name":"Pedro Braga","username":"predobrega","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/predobrega/{size}/211207_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-11T02:55:04.491Z","cooked":"

Hello everyone. Had a little discussion with a team member earlier today about whether we should use redundant (POE+Weidmuller) power for the radio, or if only one of them was enough, so I got curious about what you guys are using.

  • Weidmuller
  • POE
  • Both
0 voters

A lot more people using Weidmuller only than I had expected, especially after the R703 changes. Does someone know why?

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":9,"updated_at":"2025-02-11T13:00:00.828Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":227,"readers_count":226,"score":60.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":491130,"topic_slug":"poll-how-are-you-powering-your-radio","display_username":"Pedro Braga","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63359,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/poll-how-are-you-powering-your-radio/491130/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3523238,"name":"Ben Edwards","username":"beedward","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/beedward/{size}/111315_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-11T13:06:31.864Z","cooked":"

I have an intense distrust of the orange POE injector cable. We’ve had issues with the data portion of the connection. Buying a dodgy passive POE injector on Amazon or building one ourselves doesn’t seem like a great place to go either, and the RPM is the same as the Weidmuller connection but with extra steps - one power connection only. We’ll see how it goes

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":9,"updated_at":"2025-02-11T13:06:31.864Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":220,"readers_count":219,"score":64.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":491130,"topic_slug":"poll-how-are-you-powering-your-radio","display_username":"Ben Edwards","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":63359,"username":"predobrega","name":"Pedro Braga","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/predobrega/{size}/211207_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":37435,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"EE mentor"},"post_url":"/t/poll-how-are-you-powering-your-radio/491130/5","custom_user_title":"EE mentor","reactions":[{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3523252,"name":"Pedro Braga","username":"predobrega","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/predobrega/{size}/211207_2.png","created_at":"2025-02-11T13:17:09.550Z","cooked":"
beedward:

I have an intense distrust of the orange POE injector cable.

Interesting. You still have to have a POE injector between your rio and radio though, no? So how are you doing that?

Edit: Nevermind, just remembered you can connect it to the aux ports.

Yep, that’s what we’re doing. High quality Ethernet cable directly between Aux2 and the RIO.
